title: New: Dante – Won’t Go
content:
Taking a sample from the biggest selling album of the year is a fairly audacious move, therefore it’s no surprise to learn that Stockholm’s Dante was denied permission by Adele’s label to include this new track on his recent release Runners. Taking vocals from the chorus of the London bawler’s He Won’t Go, it doesn’t at all feel like he’s doing it purely for the sake of it, and instead they’re perfectly suited to the magical feel of Won’t Go. Transforming the track into a seductive R’n’B inspired number, Dante Kinnunen’s vocals provide a fitting contrast to the pitch-shifted vocals of Adele, backed by heavy, brooding synths and a minimal, dubbed beat. Check out Won’t Go below.

Dante – Won´t Go by DanteKinnunen
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
